name: Chiron
info: The Bugatti Chiron is a mid-engine sports car developed and manufactured in Molsheim, France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S. The successor to the Bugatti Veyron, the Chiron was first shown at the Geneva Motor Show on March 1, 2016.

name: Veyron
info: The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engine sports car, designed and developed in Germany by the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim, France, by French automobile manufacturer Bugatti. It was named after the racing driver Pierre Veyron.

name: Divo
info: The Bugatti Divo is a mid-engine track-focused sports car developed and manufactured by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S. The car is named after French racing driver Albert Divo, who won the Targa Florio race twice in the 1920s for Bugatti.

name: Evolution
info: Ferrari Evolution is a high-performance sports car produced by the Italian automotive manufacturer Ferrari. It is an evolution of the Ferrari 458 Italia, designed to push the limits of performance and aerodynamics.

name: Superfast
info: Ferrari Evolution is a high-performance sports car produced by the Italian automotive manufacturer Ferrari. It is an evolution of the Ferrari 458 Italia, designed to push the limits of performance and aerodynamics.

name: Italia
info: The Ferrari 458 Italia is a mid-engine sports car produced by the Italian automobile manufacturer Ferrari. The 458 replaced the F430, and was first officially unveiled at the 2009 Frankfurt Motor Show.

name: Portofino
info: The Ferrari 458 Italia is a mid-engine sports car produced by the Italian automobile manufacturer Ferrari. The 458 replaced the F430, and was first officially unveiled at the 2009 Frankfurt Motor Show.

name: Pista
info: The Ferrari 488 Pista is a special edition variant of the 488 GTB, inspired by Ferrari's racing heritage. It features a more powerful engine, enhanced aerodynamics, and reduced weight compared to the standard 488 GTB.

name: FF50
info: The Ferrari 488 Pista is a special edition variant of the 488 GTB, inspired by Ferrari's racing heritage. It features a more powerful engine, enhanced aerodynamics, and reduced weight compared to the standard 488 GTB.

name: i8
info: The BMW i8 is a plug-in hybrid sports car developed by BMW. It combines a combustion engine with an electric motor to provide both high performance and excellent fuel efficiency.

name: M3 GTR
info: The BMW M3 GTR is a high-performance variant of the BMW M3. It was developed for racing purposes and is known for its success in motorsport competitions such as the American Le Mans Series.

name: M4 Coupe
info: The BMW M4 Coupe is a high-performance version of the BMW 4 Series. It features a powerful engine, enhanced aerodynamics, and a sport-tuned suspension for exceptional driving dynamics.

name: M5
info: The BMW M5 is a high-performance variant of the BMW 5 Series. It combines luxurious features with exceptional performance, making it suitable for both daily driving and track use.

name: M6 Coupe
info: The BMW M6 Coupe is a high-performance version of the BMW 6 Series. It features a powerful engine, sport-tuned suspension, and advanced technology for an exhilarating driving experience.

name: Roadster
info: The BMW Roadster is a two-seater sports car known for its sleek design and exhilarating performance. It offers open-top driving enjoyment combined with BMW's renowned engineering.

name: GT
info: The Ford GT is a high-performance sports car developed by Ford Motor Company. It was designed as a tribute to the legendary GT40 race car and incorporates advanced aerodynamics and technology.

name: Mustang
info: The Ford Mustang is an iconic American muscle car known for its powerful performance and classic design. It has been in production since 1964 and remains one of Ford's most popular models.

name: Raptor Pickup Truck
info: The Ford Raptor Pickup Truck is a high-performance off-road pickup truck designed for rugged terrain and extreme driving conditions. It features a powerful engine, advanced suspension, and off-road capabilities.

name: Aventador
info: The Lamborghini Aventador is a mid-engine sports car produced by the Italian automotive manufacturer Lamborghini. It is named after a fighting bull and is known for its aggressive styling and powerful performance.

name: Urus
info: The Lamborghini Urus is a high-performance SUV produced by the Italian automotive manufacturer Lamborghini. It combines the practicality of an SUV with the performance and luxury of a Lamborghini sports car.

name: Countech
info: The Lamborghini Countach is a mid-engine sports car produced by the Italian automotive manufacturer Lamborghini. It gained fame in the 1980s for its futuristic design and high performance.

name: Diablo
info: The Lamborghini Diablo is a mid-engine sports car produced by the Italian automotive manufacturer Lamborghini. It was introduced in 1990 as the successor to the Lamborghini Countach.

name: Huracan
info: The Lamborghini Huracan is a mid-engine sports car produced by the Italian automotive manufacturer Lamborghini. It was introduced in 2014 as the successor to the Lamborghini Gallardo.

name: Veneno
info: The Lamborghini Veneno is a limited-production high-performance sports car produced by the Italian automotive manufacturer Lamborghini. It was introduced in 2013 to celebrate Lamborghini's 50th anniversary.

name: GT
info: The McLaren GT is a grand tourer sports car produced by British automotive manufacturer McLaren Automotive. It combines luxurious features with exceptional performance and is designed for long-distance driving.

name: P1
info: The McLaren P1 is a limited-production plug-in hybrid sports car produced by British automotive manufacturer McLaren Automotive. It was introduced in 2013 and is considered one of the pioneers of hybrid hypercars.

name: Spyder
info: The McLaren 720S Spider is a convertible variant of the McLaren 720S sports car. It features a retractable hardtop roof and offers the same exhilarating performance as the coupe version.

name: AMG One
info: The Mercedes-AMG One is a limited-production plug-in hybrid sports car developed by Mercedes-AMG. It was unveiled at the 2017 International Motor Show Germany and is inspired by Formula One technology.

name: Coupe Black
info: The Mercedes-Benz S-Class Coupe Black is a high-performance luxury coupe produced by German automaker Mercedes-Benz. It features a powerful engine, luxurious interior, and advanced technology.

name: GTR
info: The Mercedes-AMG GT R is a high-performance sports car produced by German automaker Mercedes-AMG. It features a powerful engine, advanced aerodynamics, and track-focused technology for exceptional performance on the racetrack.
The Porsche 911 is a high-performance sports car produced by German automotive manufacturer Porsche AG. It has a distinctive design and has been in continuous production since 1963.

name: Cayman
info: The Porsche 718 Cayman is a mid-engine sports car produced by German automobile manufacturer Porsche AG. It is known for its exceptional handling, precise steering, and balanced performance.

name: Cayenne
info: The Porsche Cayenne is a mid-size luxury crossover SUV produced by the German manufacturer Porsche since 2002. It is the first V8-engined vehicle built by Porsche since 1995, when the Porsche 928 was discontinued.

name: Macan
info: The Porsche Macan is a compact luxury crossover SUV produced by the German manufacturer Porsche. It was first introduced in 2014 and has since become one of Porsche's best-selling models.

name: Panamera
info: The Porsche Panamera is a full-size luxury car manufactured by the German automobile manufacturer Porsche. It is front-engined and has a rear-wheel-drive layout, with all-wheel drive versions also available.

name: Taycan
info: The Porsche Taycan is an all-electric car manufactured by German automobile manufacturer Porsche. It was first unveiled as a concept car named Mission E at the 2015 Frankfurt Motor Show.
